website_summaries.verdict: Low price point per ounce for a pomade that will allow you to style almost any kind of hair.
pros: Doesn’t leave residue as you comb through it
Delivers the results you want for the entire day for most types of hair styling designs
Has a water soluble formula that will wash out easily when you’re finished using it
Gives your hair a pleasing shine, but it doesn’t overdo it
cons: Requires using quite a bit of the product to achieve the style you want

customer_reviews.title: Buy it regularly.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, the best pomade hands down. I will buy this product for the rest of my life. Medium hold with shine. I use all suavecito products daily. They all meet my standards.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Good for post partum hair regrowth
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a terrible problem with a halo of baby hairs growing back after post pregnancy hair loss. My hair has been sticking up every which way as it grows back and I look like a mad scientist. I have used hairspray, and they popped up. Blew dry the pieces and they stick back up. Gel and they stick back up. I finally tried this stuff and a little dab actually works. Just don't use too much or you'll look like a greaseball! And be prepared to smell like a man. But to me, that's better than looking like an absolute lunatic with uncontrollable hair!
customer_reviews.author: JennyO

customer_reviews.title: Best pomade money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best pomade that I have ever used. I researched for several months the different types of pomades available on Amazon. After trying around 10 different types I settled on Suavecito. It is water based and doesn't make your hair feel like Vaseline has been run through it. It easily washes out with simple water. Also, with a small amount of water, you can simply reactivate the pomade to restyle your hair, if needed. I have found myself doing this when I wake up in the morning and go for a run. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Justin W Baker

customer_reviews.title: Makes my kid smell like a man but works great
customer_reviews.text: Saw this at a barber shop when getting my sons haircut so wanted to try it out due to the cool packaging alone. I love how you only need very little for this product to go along way, which in the end you get alot of your money. It has a strong hold without leaving a sticky residue. The only thing I may change would be to have different scent options, my little dude does smell like an older man wearing musk cologne but it isn't too bad just could be better in that regard but no complaints otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Pacfrog

customer_reviews.title: The pomade you’ve been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I usually use American Crew products and was looking for something with a little more value. I get cautious switching hair products but I’m happy I gave Suavecito a shot. It isn’t sticky, it works through my hair evenly, and it dries quickly without leaving my hair super crispy. This pomade smells great too, I’ll be giving the Winter 2017 pomade a shot too. I should say I have had trouble with hair products in the past because I have curly hair, and my hair styles straighten my hair. Finding something that works for me has been a lot of trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shamus

customer_reviews.title: Been wanting to review this one.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 34, i have the thickest hair ive ever come across. For the last 20 years of my life i gave up trying to find a way to style my hair, thought I'd just have to live with the first hair i could. No stylist could ever find a way to make it listen. I tried hard gels, american crew, brylcreem, nothing worked. I put just a finger tip amount of this product and my life changed. There's almost nothing i can't get it to do now. For the first time ever, i love my hair. You have a customer for life, i want to try your other products now too. Also, love the logo
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best pomade I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I'm terribly vain about my hair for starters, but I've got great hair so why not be? I was intrigued when my barber used this, as it held great, had good shine, smelled amazing, and washed out easily. I bought some from his shop and was very pleased, I was more pleased when I found the genuine article on amazon for cheaper when it was time to buy more. It's a wonderful product that incredibly affordable and lasts a while! If you have thicker and/or longer hair I'd recommend getting the firmer hold if you want things to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: the courier

customer_reviews.title: I liked everything about the Layrite except the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new pomade and my barber gave me a sample of Layrite to try. I liked everything about the Layrite except the price. I dug around and found Suavecito pomade. I agree with the reviews that say it is the same or similar to Layrite. Suavecito works great and offers just the right hold for me. My hair is thin and products that are too heavy easily weigh my hair down, make it greasy, etc. Suavecito has a medium-strong hold and lasts all day. You may even re-style a little later in the day with a small amount of water if need be. I recommend this pomade.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lamprecht

customer_reviews.title: Nice hold, but very strong scent.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very nice hold with no residue as advertised, but the description says it has a light and fresh scent. That’s not true. It’s very heavily scented like men’s Axe spray. As a heads up to ladies it’s a very masculine scent, and even for the guys it’s so strong that it’s making me sneeze. This product is unwearable for me which is a shame because the hold is good.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: Great but hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ten year old son so he could style his hair. We have tried several products (hair spray, gel, etc.) and he disliked them because they either didn't last long or they left white residue in his hair. When my husband took him to his barber, he used this Suavecito. It has incredible hold, scent and shine. He liked how his hair looked so I ordered it for him. The downside? It was hard for us to manipulate the product. It's very thick and it took quite a bit of it to achieve style.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Holds the best
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this sculpting pomade. The scent is fresh, and this holds all day long for them. What I would like to see, in value for the money, is if they would provide some kind of volume discount. My boys go through this stuff every month, and it gets expensive. Buy 2 or 3 or more and provide a better price point, then we'll give a better value for the money score. We like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried to like it more....
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who is two to help get his fohawk to stand up. The product itself is great and works better than others but man the smell..... I can’t stand it! It’s like a cheap cologne smell and it’s so strong. Every time I use it I try to not notice but ugh it just reeks which is such a shame because it does an awesome job holding up and it’s easy to rewet and restyle his hair after his nap and it washes out very easy.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not firm hold
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this by accident (he usually gets firm hold) but I for one am happy he did. It gives him a decent amount of hold but not to the point where it holds its exact shape and reforms to the exact same style it was placed in if you try to rework it. He’ll probably end up reordering the firm hold later on but until then I get to enjoy his guapo messy curls at the end of the day 😉
customer_reviews.author: Orcheez

customer_reviews.title: Glad I read the reviews and took a chance
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant on purchasing a pomade i've never seen or smelt or felt before. Glad I read the reviews and took a chance. This pomade will be all that you will ever need. It has a nice firm hold and can withstand wind. I drive with windows down and my hair usually stays in place. If not, it is easily placed back in place. It has a nice subtle manly cologne smell. You won't regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new hairstyling Secret
customer_reviews.text: Now that I am saying good bye to gels and some other hairstyle grooming paraphernalia, I would like to commend this product for it has been so good to me, pomenade extremely changes my look without getting my hair look so dry and hard. This pomade right here gives me that style wherein it looks so natural all the way and lasts for 24hrs. Yeah, That's how amazing it is!! Oh, and the smell! damn! so good! My wife have been slightly starting to use this when she styles her hair all the way too. This is so great! I never regretted the day I decided to change preference!
customer_reviews.author: Mel A Lasala

customer_reviews.title: Buy Suavecito!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Suavecito. It is a wonderful pomeade that, in my opinion, is the best product I have found to date. I have used more than several dozen brands and this is in an entire other league. I really like the smell as well. The best part of Suavecito is the price. I've bought products that cost five times as much and not been as happy as I am with this product. I have bought this product for over 3 years now and will continue to do so for as long as it is available for purchase. I'd like to say I use this on all my children as well. Thank you for this great and amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: G&C John

customer_reviews.title: high recommended pomade!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the pomades I've used, Suavecito is hands down my favorite one to use. I've been using this every day since I've purchased it, and I barely ever touch the other ones (including L'Oreal, Crew, and Port City). It smells great, which is a plus, I can't get sick of it. It also smears very well and evenly in the hands which allows for you to distribute it throughout your hair evenly. It holds throughout the day, and it doesn't have that glossy look that you get from gel. It is perfect for my hair type, which is thick and about 4" long.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Word.
customer_reviews.text: "Hey, I like your cologne today," my co-worker emphasized today, but I wasn't wearing any for once. My tall buddy leaned over and sniffed, declaring, "it's SUAVECITO for sure." Aside from smelling fresh, This always performs. Up yours 'bed head' 'surfer clay' garbage. I drive with a sunroof. All I need is a small comb, and I'm business.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Mercury

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest, when the product first arrived and I smelled it, I hated it. It was really strong and not a pleasant smell. But after a day or two the smell died down and it’s much more manageable. Using it, it goes on pretty well and rinses with water, but it may not have the strongest hold unless you use more. The shine is pretty good and isn’t in your face. The product isn’t really for me in terms of the smell, but it isn’t bad as long as you give it a day after it arrives. Overall a pretty good product though, but I would try a couple other brands to find the one you like best.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the name brand products I was using for 10 years.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using some store bought brands over the last 10 years and decided to try something new as I just didn't feel I was getting the quality I needed. Other brands flaked off a lot and when I wore black shirts by the end of the day it looked like I had a bad case of dandruff. I'm so glad I purchased this product. For less the price and more product I am extremely happy with my purchase. This stuff just has a better texture and a more natural looking hold. I love it!! Will be a long time buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Evans

customer_reviews.title: A good product but has its flaws
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this pomade going into it with high hopes an was let down slightly. It has its pros being it gives you a medium to high shine with a firm hold and a decent smell. But I some how find the cons being more dominate then the pros. This pomade for me dried out my scalp leaving it itchy. It dried out my actually hair it's self with just a basic was out with water (no shampoo) and from time to time it would flake. Now I'm not descourageing any one from buying g this product , I'm just saying it didn't work that well for me .
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: Suavecito is The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: Discovered this a few years ago and it's all I use now. Has a great scent, water soluble and hold just enough without making your hair white. If you're looking for a super strong hold, look elsewhere, this is not for you. But if you want your hair to remain soft and smooth while getting it to do what you want? Get this.
customer_reviews.author: Keagan

customer_reviews.title: Stylin' Profilin'
customer_reviews.text: Suavecito Pomade (the original) is a product I was eager to test out! It arrived exceptionally fast, has a welcoming (somewhat spicy) aroma and was generously filled to the top with product. The application process was simple enough and I could easily maintain control of my hair, while not feeling rushed by rapid hardening. Sometimes I had a few cosmetic touch-ups on my hair I wanted to fix, adding a slight bit of water to my hands reactivated the product and was easy to correct. After using this product, the only con I have noticed is on humid days my hair drooped slightly and required a shot of hairspray. Overall, very pleased and recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar A

customer_reviews.title: Best pomade I have tried
customer_reviews.text: After seeing how many great reviews there were for this pomade, I figured that I would give it a shot. I have tried a few different pomades in the past but this is by far the best one that I have tried. The scent is nice and the hold isn't too firm but lasts all day. It even has enough flex that I keeps the hold after wearing a winter cap. This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Potocki

customer_reviews.title: perfect Pomade
customer_reviews.text: After trying lots of pomades I can say we finally found the one. It has a great smell superior hold and washes clean out of the hair leaving no residue behind. we use the original hold and it works perfectly for both the slick look and also when I blow it dry and want a lighter hold. This product also is easy to work through the hair. If you have been trying all the new pomades out there but can't seem to find the right one definitely give this one a try it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: R. BRADFORD

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect if you don't want hard hair but you need it to stay!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 oz container to try it out... currently, I'm using the 32 oz FIRM HOLD, but I find that it leaves my hair hard... This pomade will break easy and with just a little bit a water, it will go right back where you put it. I'm definitely going to buy the larger container of the original hold.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Stowell

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pomade!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried numerous products for my son, who has very thick and unruly hair. This pomade is the only one that truly works. It is best when applied to his dry hair & then water can be added to refresh the style or rework the pomade. It does not leave residue or any flakes, but does require a bit more scrubbing to shampoo out.
customer_reviews.author: mnb826

customer_reviews.title: The smell is really good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of reviews saying the smell is good. Indeed, the smell of this pomade is very pleasant. It's not too strong or weird. It has a sweet smell to it. The pomade itself is good as well. The hold is very good and lasts all day. It can be weak during hot and humid days though. Other than that, I would recommend giving this a try. If you have sensitive skin this will cause your fingers to kind of peel off.
customer_reviews.author: R.K

customer_reviews.title: Great hold but not sticky or stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair and use a wax to keep the style all day. One of my coworkers had this product in his hair and was raving about it. I bought it in his recommendation and am glad I did. I’ve used this the last few days and love the hold and the texture. I need to get the one with the coconut fragrance now!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, clean feel
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. This pomade is easy to style, doesn't feel greasy or heavy, and washes out quickly with water. My hair is thick with a lot of natural volume, so mainly I'm using pomade to get it under control for a "business" look. Provides a nice sheen without looking wet.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pomade
customer_reviews.text: My boys where using Crew pomade for years and one of their barbers suggested Suavecito Pomade Original Hold. We decided to try it and purchased it from the barber shop. This pomade is amazing, however we ran out. I decided to purchase the pomade on Amazon because it was cheaper. We received the pomade promptly. Sauvecito Pomade Original Hold does not make the hair feel stiff, it makes styling the hair easy and the hair stays in place all day. We will diffidently be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Nate G

customer_reviews.title: Great product that does exactly as it says
customer_reviews.text: I love This stuff. I switched from brylcream about a year ago and wont go back. Even after a long sweaty day at work just a littpe water on my hands(not even dripping just damp) and run a comb thru and my girl thinks I played hooky all day. Ive gottenlots of compliments from men about the sheen and style and I get some nice looks from the ladies as well.
customer_reviews.author: shawn badger

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a shot; Went back to Layrite
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Layrite, but since it was temporarily out of stock I gave Suavecito a try. I was hoping to find a replacement as it's (ever so) slightly cheaper than Layrite. After once jar of Suavecito, I'm glad to be back on Layrite. You'll need to use a LOT of the Suavecito to get a decent hold. And once you do, your hair will look wet yet frozen because you have so much product in your hair. So not only does it not look as good, you'll go through it twice as fast!
customer_reviews.author: M. Flutka

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had read good things about the Suavecito product line and I must say I can't but agree with them. The pomade is perfect for my needs and provides a rather strong hold while leaving me room to style my hair - which is rather thick; it also is 'beanie-proof' and leaves no residue when washed off. Sometimes, and based on my previous experience, the stronger the hold, the more difficult it gets to have your hair the way you want, but this pomade seems to provide a rather satisfying balance. Finally, it smells nice - more of an aftershave-like scent but not too strong anyway, in my view. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally wavy hair. I was hoping this product would eliminate the frizz, and freeze it into shape. All I was left with was a straight piece of hair. I tried with varying levels of this product, yet my wavy hair wouldn't keep a curl. I know this product would work if I wanted to keep my straightened bobbed hair straight (No Capes!), but for curls - no dice.
customer_reviews.author: moltabocca

customer_reviews.title: High quality product - Feels clean, smells great, and holds all day and night
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying every big brand name for managing my hair, my barber recommended this product. I am pleased n many fronts. If I forget to wash it out at the end of the day, it doesn't leave residue on my pillows (or the headrest in my car). It doesn't flake or feel like I'm torturing my hair with chemicals. Smells great, easy to manage, and feels very clean. So glad I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Using it for Years
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 6 years, after I was given a sample at a fundraiser in Los Angeles. It smells good and is strong and effective and holds my hair all day. It also doesn't feel hard to the touch, and even when it messes up a bit I can easily fix all day. I don't like to spend a lot of time on my hair, and this is the product. I dont think I'll ever use another product.
customer_reviews.author: McClaren1

customer_reviews.title: Ehh not the best
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Crew pomade/or wax to do a combover style with a fade on the sides so I decided to give these a shot because of the good reviews, however this product definitly does not do a good job at making hair stay up/volumized. It has a decent smell, but by an hour my hair starts to fall on my face. If you have thick hair then this probably won't do you so well, but it's definitely cheaper than other products like Crew. Give it a shot, but personally it didn't do me any justice. Gonna stick to Crew.
customer_reviews.author: Hamed Sherzai

customer_reviews.title: Smells great. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, easy to use. If you want to reshape your hair just reactivate with a little water and clean up. People on here complain about the scent but that’s one my favorite aspects of the pomade. It’s not too loud and is very nice. Only down side is I feel like bees are more attracted to me now. And to those complaining about it being crunchy, you should be using a matte pomade or just use less. I’ve been doing the 50s style classic men’s slick back pomp with it. Love this stuff and it makes me leave the hats at home.
customer_reviews.author: ian jones

customer_reviews.title: Great hold, scent could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this product and I really like it. I have always used Crew Pomade because my hair is very thin and it does a good job of holding my hair in place, but to get the right hold I have to use quite a bit and then it's obvious I'm using a hair gel. I tried using "difi" but that's like putting Elmer's glue in my hair. Suavicito has just the right hold, it lasts, it isn't obvious, and it washes out easily. The only thing I would ask for is an unscented version. I don't hate the scent, it just clashes with my own cologne and truthfully, it does smell like a drugstore bargain scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, a friend had me try it a couple years ago and I’ve been using it ever since, great hold, good sent and washes out easy. I have tried the firm hold version and didn’t see that much of a difference so I will keep buying the original.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, smelled great, made my hair look good
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, rarely used it because I dont like having things on my hair, but when it was needed it was there. It kept my hair very manageable, dont apply too much or it will toast your hair, its very effective and easy to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: The_Blacked_IPs

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Hair Product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many of the pomade products out there and keep coming back to this one. The scent smells really good, the hold is amazing all day long, and there are many different scents in their lineup. My only gripe is the price. It does tend to get expensive assuming you are using this product daily. If you have not tried this brand, I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Chance The Drone Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best styling product I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I have been using the same Redkin product since 1999 and nothing else worked well for me. I normally have short haircuts like high and tights and flip my hair up. This is hands down the best product I have ever used in my hair plus it smells really good. No flaking, holds all day and cant be beat. You can even wake up in the morning and restyle it with some water (if you were in a huge rush or Saturday morning). Already converted couple other guys. I found it by accident when getting a hair cut, took a picture of it and found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a hair gel than a true pomade IMO. I’ve been looking for a pomade since going back to a flattop and after reading reviews and research I decided on this. Didn’t really hold my flattop up and gave the appearance that my hair is thinning which is not. This product is probably better suited for people with longer hair just not for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz_O

customer_reviews.title: Best Pomade On The Market!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many products out there and this one is the best! The best part is that water breaks it down so your hair doesn’t have that greasy feel to it after you shower and wash your hair. A little bit goes a long way. I highly recommend this product and will purchase again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: If you ever wondered how Coolio got his hair crazy and stayed in position....this is it. This is like super glue in paste form. My mistake was getting the hard hold, I'm struggling with figuring out the amount and spreadability for my hair style. That's on me, I didn't catch the "hard" hold denotation. A very tiny amount hold my hair in position for hours with no flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Strac

customer_reviews.title: I love Suavecito!
customer_reviews.text: Been using Suavecito for over a year at this point - never been disappointed. I was previously using Firme Hold, this is my first time purchasing regular. It is exactly what I expected. I am very happy with the product; it really is the only product at this point that I really use. I have tried others (pomades, creams, clays, etc.) but I keep coming back to Suavecito. Great product, great results, great price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Suavecito has made a name for itself offering a water based pomade that’s readily available, high shine, good hold and at a very reasonable price. The scent, albeit somewhat specific to a subculture within the US, always smells clean and masculine. The seller for this was efficient and the packaging arrived in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds OK.  Smells terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells terrible. It has this odd smokey, burnt tobacco smell that is hard to wash out with just water. I used a small amount to slick my hair back and the smell just radiates from me. The hold was ok. It wasn't super strong for my thin, fine hair but wasn't terrible either. I just couldn't get passed the smell.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ong

customer_reviews.title: Good switch from regular hair spray
customer_reviews.text: I used to use regular hair spray but I switch to this at the recommendation of my barber. It's more controllable and has great hold throughout the day. If I need to restyle my hair, I can just add a little water to my hands and reshape my hair and the gel will still hold it. The smell is not to noticeable but it's there so I took off one star. I'm ambivalent to it but I don't think most people would find it offensive. There's plenty in this container and mine has lasted me 2 months even though I use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: sde123

customer_reviews.title: Great Pomade
customer_reviews.text: So, I usually don't use pomade in my hair, I like the matte finish. But I figured I would give this a try. I have straight thick hair and this works great. The hold is strong all day, even through a gym workout or running. My favorite thing about Suavecito products is how they wash out of your hair. Usually, pomade leaves a gross texture but this washes out great. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L Meixner

customer_reviews.title: You catch more flys with honey, and you catch more honeys by being fly.
customer_reviews.text: If you use Pomade you already know Suavecito is one of the best out there. It holds well, smells great, and washes out easy. I do like the violent gentlemen, from Suavecito, a little better as it has a more firm hold and a more cologne like smell. That is just a personal preference though.
customer_reviews.author: Kellobyte

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This pomade it great! I love how easy it is to put in the hair and how well it keeps the hair in place. The smell is really nice too. It’s easy to wash out and you can just add water if you want to reactivate a hairstyle. I use it for my boys hair which is cut in the pompadour hairstyle.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Widmer

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold, washes out easily, hasn't dried out
customer_reviews.text: This water-based pomade is easily the best one I've used. I have shorter hair, maybe 1-1.5 inches in length, and this holds about as well as gel without the flaking. There is a scent to it that doesn't stick around for more than a few minutes after application. Unlike the Layrite super hold pomade I bought, this has shown no signs of drying out after using it daily for several weeks now. This is probably the pomade I'll stick with for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon N

customer_reviews.title: If fragrances bother you, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh. The fragrance is SO STRONG that I can’t handle it. It makes me feel nauseated. It smells like someone dumped an entire bottle of cologne in the one jar of pomade. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Buller

customer_reviews.title: 5+Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old son went from long hair (down past his shoulders) to a quite stylish short haircut. The barber recommended Sauvecito. My son, who is in middle school LOVES this product. He will not use anything else. I must say, it smells good. The girls at school like the smell too. It holds his style very well. 5 Stars+ from Mom and 5 Stars from my son!!
customer_reviews.author: spyderjo

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I usually use hair gel, but decided to venture out and try something else. I went through several brands before trying this one out, and honestly the reason I stuck with it was the scent. It doesn’t smell like diesel fuel, and I like it. It holds well, looks nice, and is easy to wash out at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lemonslices

customer_reviews.title: I never grew out my hair because I hated having to use gel
customer_reviews.text: I never grew out my hair because I hated having to use gel. Luckily I found this! If you take the time and attention you'll find a happy balance of how much product to use. My hair is EXTREMELY stubborn, yet requires a small finger dollops worth of this. Yes it is true too much of this and your hair will feel hard, but just pay attention and youll get the perfect style while still feeling extremely soft and more importantly natural. As for sheen I'm able to style mine with little to no sheen, I think opposing reviews are due to user error. If you use this product correct, Im pretty positive youll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I got it after one of my regular haircuts where the hairdresser used a similar product to style my hair. I decided to do some research and ended up getting this one. It stays on through the day and as mentioned, just needs a little bit of water to style it however you want. And it washes away quickly when I take a shower. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nivy

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Always a favorite go-to when I decide that I need some pomade. Well made and the scent is clean and masculine. Washes out with water alone too. Best part is that it's small enough to toss in my bag in case I need a little to make my hair just pop for the day!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t tell all your friends about this amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of my favorite pomades ever. The hold on this stuff is amazing, and lasts all day if you apply the right amount which varies on hair length. I see people complain about the smell, which is confusing because it smells amazing!! If you can’t stand the smell, maybe you shouldn’t style your hair? Price is great, and beats most products out there for the guys. Shoot sometimes my girl takes a bit when I’m not noticing lol. Good stuff, don’t hestitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Solid hold without the greasy look
customer_reviews.text: Love the hold that I get with this for the low shine outcome. I have pretty fine hair so it can tend to be all over the place, but my son has really thick course hair that refuses to stay where you put it. This product works for both of us -
customer_reviews.author: Mac Strong

customer_reviews.title: It smells good, but it is overpowering
customer_reviews.text: After reading rave reviews for Suavecito, I decided to give it a try. The smell is very strong... It smells good, but it is overpowering, in my opinion. This water based pomade is easy to use and apply to your hair, but it won't straighten out any waves and the hold isn't as strong as I was expecting. Overall, if you have shorter hair this product will probably do the trick, but if you have longer hair and are looking to style your hair as a pompadour, etc, I recommend you look to something stronger. I really like Goon Grease, but to each their own.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and how easy it is spreads on my hands and Applies so smooth in my hair. It’s not clumpy at all. Also you don’t need much and it holds all day. Fall asleep with it in my hair sometimes and still looks good the next morning
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best pomade around
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of pomade, and I've got a lot of hair. This pomade has excellent hold and shine, and at this price point, is the most affordable pomade I can find. If you're looking for a good pomade, I can't recommend this one enough!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Suavecito baby!
customer_reviews.text: If this stuff holds down my hair in humidity, it will hold down anything. The scent is a little getting used to, but not too bad overall, easy to wash off no issues with sticky hair afterwards. Looked like Richie Valens everytime I went out, the ladies loved the Suavecito!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot because I can either go for the wet look or the "I woke up with my hair like this". Hold all day and if the wind messes my hair I damp my hands a little and I style my hair on the go without using more gel.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It also doesn't wash out as easily as the label claims
customer_reviews.text: This is the most mediocre "pomade" that I have used, and I wouldn't even call it that. It's a gel, plain and simple. It also doesn't wash out as easily as the label claims, which drives me mad because I hate having the smell transfer to my pillow cases even after washing my hair 3 times. From using other much better pomades such as Anchors, I've gotten used to the idea of not having hard crunchy gel hair, which makes suavecito my last choice out of all of my pomades. I've used it maybe 2 or three times since buying it 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering Scent
customer_reviews.text: The hold gives out after a couple of hours. I probably should have gotten. I think I will stick with, though, because the Layrite holds like a champ and has a very mild scent. The Suavecito scent, on the other hand, is truly overpowering and stays strong all day. It reminds me of cheap cologne.
customer_reviews.author: S. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Washes out easily, holds by limp hair very well, can be recharged with a bit of water for a midday touch up and it smells awesome. The smell lasts long after my cologne has given out.
customer_reviews.author: WillametteWolf

customer_reviews.title: Husband’s fav
customer_reviews.text: My husbands favorite product. His hair looks nice & smells divine. I prefer to buy it here with free shipping compared to other places with minimum amount for free shipping
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Not quiet sure how I came across it but from the first time I tried suavecito I have not gone back! I've tried many other types of hair products but none work for me the way this does! Nice strong, but yet movable and playable, hold! Nice subtle shine look and NO FLAKING! I have naturally waving hair and this really helps keep my hair straight enough for a nice smooth combover! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo s.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This pomade has a good strong hold. I put it in after a shower while my hair is still damp. It holds in place all day and provides a wet look. You really only need to use a small amount if your hair is shorter. Use to much and your hair will become ultra stiff
customer_reviews.author: brian c

customer_reviews.title: Solid pomade for a slickback
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuff without knowing how it would behave, so I'm doing a slickback with it now. It definitely doesn't hold as well as I need it to for getting sweaty while working or being in a hot climate
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's hair because he didn't like how gel flakes after a while; this definitely does the trick. It's very easy to apply and I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Guiselle

customer_reviews.title: Great Pomade
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! My hair is very thick and hard to deal with. This stuff holds well and comes out easily with water. Will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Weaver

customer_reviews.title: A very good pomade at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I use both oil based and water based pomade, and this is a great water based pomade. I find the performance as well as feel and finish of the product very similar to other water based pomade costing more. This will become my new go to for water based pomade.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't tame my unruly hair
customer_reviews.text: Pomade gives up hold after only a few hours. Had hairs sticking up every which way. Gave it a shot on different occasions, used increasing amounts until I was just slathering the stuff on my head. It's fairly workable to start, but not worth me having to rework my hair 3 times a day, may try the stronger hold, but this didnt cut it. Scent wasn't unpleasant but otherwise unremarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Babb

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! The smell is great and not too overwhelming. Sometimes it gives a firmer hold that I want and makes it clumpy but that's because I apply it when my hair is still wet and that doesn't work well. Overall I love this product and continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: low56

customer_reviews.title: this little tub lasts a very long time and with fine results.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of negative reviews on this product but I can't help but think those people are using too much of this. You only need a very small amount to do the job. I have short hair and use just a small dab to control and hold my cut in place. I suppose if you hand long hair, you might have to use more and it could end up looking greasy but for me, this little tub lasts a very long time and with fine results.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love product & seller!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend ONLY uses this hair gel, it’s his FAVORITE. I wasn’t going to write a review bcs it’s the holidays and I’m busy BUT the sellers reached out to me to make sure everything was okay with my order and I loved it. Yes, everything was perfect and I will be back!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia V.

customer_reviews.title: Careful, it might cause allergies.
customer_reviews.text: After a week or two of usage I started suffering of seborrhea, I don't know if it was the product or not but I've discontinued it's usage. The seborrhea growth has stopped but I'm still struggling with it. I can't say I recommend it. Maybe my scalp is allergic to one of its components.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Perez

customer_reviews.title: doesn't do much at all
customer_reviews.text: if you like adding scented oil to your hair, this does the trick. if you want something that works as pomade and helps you style your hair, this does absolutely nothing. zero hold, zero longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Mtm420

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results! If you have never used it
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality hair product sold at a Walmart price. Excellent results! If you have never used it, give it a try. It works exactly as described. You will not be disappointed. You don't need to spend big bucks when this works so well. (This is used by the men in my house)
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: Works but caused scalp irritation.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a slicked hard part. Only problem is after a few weeks of use it started to sting on my scalp and my scalp became chronically itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This pomade smells amazing and it doesn’t hold very strong but it gets the job done ✅ I love it for my son. Also, if you have thick hair this might not be for you, my son is 9 and has soft thin hair
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Did not Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me but may work for you. Seem to make my hair stand up on end, Nutty Professor. I liked the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product — Great Company
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. I use a variety of pomades & this is one of my favorites. Plus, these guys are a real southern CA success story out of Santa Ana. They are now making hand sanitizer to help out during the pandemic. If you don’t use pomade buy a T-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: If you need a good pomade, you're in the right place
customer_reviews.text: I decided to change the hairstyle I've had for 25 years and went with a side part. I needed a decent product to help it stay and heard about Suavecito in my searching. Very pleased with the product. It does exactly what it's supposed to and it smells nice too. It's also water soluble which is great because I'm still learning how to style my new..er..style, and when I screw up and use too much, I can just rinse it out and try again. If you need a good pomade, don't hesitate, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Shoub

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Our barber recommended this product for our son. I (the mom) now use it for my hair too!! Love it. Not greasy and holds my crazy hair in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: William Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Ladies love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I very much love how good this smells. My wife loves it too. It goes on like a gel and holds decently throughout the day. I have thick, almost curly hair so if I want a really good hold, I have to use a lot of it- which is kind of a downer. I just wish I got more for the price. I've used Murray's before and dislike the viscosity, makes it harder to apply and rinse out, although I appreciate the hold a lot more. I use Suavecito when my hair is shorter, but when I let the top grow out to about 4 inches, I have to use something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Daroga

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after forgetting that I had bought the extra hold the last time. We use it for my 9 year old son- he is very active. The extra hold stayed in better- but again he is an active kid- the extra hold was better for him. Overall- the smell is nice, the hair styles how we want it, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Terrific pomade with awesome skeleton logo
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this pomade three times now since it is so pleasant with a good hold and usability on my Asian hair. Really easy to achieve a semi-undercut style with this stuff. I can easily wash it out too with a good amount of water. I haven't seen it reactivate really well with additional water but I still think it does the job and I'll keep buying this as it is not super expensive and is great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Superian

customer_reviews.title: As promised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised, great stuff, relocated from New York to North Florida, this one will not work on heavy humidity weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Ramos

customer_reviews.title: No outside nor inside seal on the package
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is good. However I will give 5 star rating after seller will add some sort of anti tampering seal to the package of the product. My problem is that there is no seal whatsoever. Not from the outside nor when you open the lid. So when customer receives it there is no proof that it wasn't opened before. Ordered twice this product before but will think hard before ordering again if seller will not fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: razinka

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Hold
customer_reviews.text: My husband had tried TONS of different pomades over the years and this has been his go to for years now. It does not create a super stiff look, but holds well with a more natural look and no flaking. If you need to fix your look just add a little water, restyle, and go!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just a dab of this sweet flavored compound in my hair in the morning is enough to make all the ladies stop drop and open up shop...but that's not all, if you're looking for that all day hold that brushes out easy and makes you feel like a champion amongst men then look no further...I put this on and I feel like I can bench press a dump truck full of gorilla weiners
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: super tacky like a pomade but it’s water based so ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the stuff, super tacky like a pomade but it’s water based so it’s super easy to wash out. It works best with you hair a little damp but not wet for styling. One word of caution don’t work out with it in your hair because as you sweat it will run into your eyes and sting, not terribly by definitely not enjoyable. It has a subtle dude fragrance which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Motomarks

customer_reviews.title: Good gel/pomade
customer_reviews.text: My favorite gel/pomade. Works exactly how described. I like the wet, more firm look, so I apply to damp hair. It smells pleasant, not like other more expensive gels. Will continue to keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mann

product_meta.title: Suavecito Pomade Original Hold - 4 oz
feature_bullets: Original Hold, Medium Strength. Suavecito Original Hold Pomade dries with a medium hardness without a crunchy finish.
Combs easily with no white resedue.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
